entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 3.
